item.description:
No plans this Valentine's Day? Join us for our Valentine's Day Stoplight Party!! Wear your colors to show your status! Green: you're single and ready to mingle! Yellow: It's Complicated. Red: Taken. Whatever your status the party will be in full swing! Enjoy FLIP IT N SIP IT! Flip a coin, call it correctly and your drink/beer/shot is FREE!! $4 Red Headed Sluts & $2 Valentine's Shots! Feelin' lucky?

 

http://www.blackbearhartford.com/
item.why: I'm single and this is a awesome idea and event that I found :-)
item.name: BLACK BEAR'S VALENTINE'S STOPLIGHT PARTY!!
